name: A Way To Die (itch)
description:
A Way To Die is a Single Player 2D rogueLike game set in the human corpse. You play as a disease and try to successfully infect your host by exploring the different parts of the human body, finding items that improve your bacteria/virus or defeating cells to collect and transform them into energy or keep them to evolve permanently your disease.

Control : 

-WASD To Move

-LEFT Click to shoot

-RIGHT Click for multiple shoot

-R to reset

-SPACE for special abilities

-TAB to open the full map
